predicate.note: Frames file for 'originate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry.

roleset.name: create, come about

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Initially, the company said it will close its commercial real-estate lending division, and stop *trace* originating new leases at its commercial lease subsidiary.

example.name: ergative with attribute
example.text: John's insecurity originated as a defense mechanism.

example.name: ergative with source
example.text: John's violent tendencies, on the other hand, originated from his insecurity.

roleset.note: Arg3 would be a benefactive (based on 'create'), but I doubt that will appear.
